title: Hello World API
overview: A minimal API with a single endpoint that returns a greeting.

endpoints.title: Get Hello Message
endpoints.behaviour: When called, the server responds with a fixed greeting message. No request body is accepted.

responses.200: Success. Returns a JSON object containing a greeting message.
responses.400: Bad request. Returned if a request body is provided (body must be empty).

invariants: The response body MUST contain a string field named 'message'.
The value of 'message' MUST be exactly 'Hello, world!'.

notes: This is intentionally minimal to validate the schema format.
The endpoint has no parameters and no request body.
